intro: I am Kieu Anh, Content Creator.
intro-position: Fresher Full Stack Developer / Flutter Developer
about-content-2: in Ho Chi Minh City. I have worked at Grand World International Clinic in this position. I am currently an Employer Branding specialist at Bamboo Airways and have achieved certain accomplishments in these roles.
about-content-3: In the future, I aspire to become an excellent Content Creator and achieve greater success.
skill-intro: To become a successful Content Creator, I always refresh myself by continuously updating information to boost my creativity. Not only am I responsible for writing and ideation, but I am also proficient in using design tools like Canva and CapCut to effectively convey content. Additionally, I am skilled in office tools such as Google Docs, Google Forms, Google Sheets, and Google Slides for managing and supporting my work.
footer-info: Developed by Hoang An in 2024, this is a portfolio showcasing the skills, experience, and creativity of Kieu Anh as a Content Creator.
